Title: 811: Scaling Data Science Teams Effectively, with Nick Elprin
Description:
Nick Elprin talks to Jon Krohn about how and when to scale a data science team and its workflows to secure a company’s commercial viability. You’ll also hear how to launch your own data science startup and why it’s so important to understand that AI tools are not one-size-fits-all.


This episode is brought to you by AWS Inferentia and AWS Trainium. Interested in sponsoring a SuperDataScience Podcast episode? Email natalie@superdatascience.com for sponsorship information.


In this episode you will learn:

• How Nick served enterprises with his AI startup, Domino Data Lab [05:36]

• About the Navy’s own mine detection models [17:43]

• The hype surrounding GenAI [30:35]

• How AI platforms integrate with business strategies [39:49]

• When it’s time to integrate an AI tool into your business [51:12]

• Why Nick started Domino Data Lab [1:03:53]


Additional materials: www.superdatascience.com/811
